funFacts.label: Review Machine Mode
funFacts.detail: While shipping 27 PRs, you also kept the team moving with 356 reviews—basically the CI pipeline’s best friend.

funFacts.label: Top Teammate Boost
funFacts.detail: Most-reviewed teammate: @pelegbr (63 reviews). That’s elite-level pairing—without even sharing a keyboard.

funFacts.label: Biggest PR (by churn)
funFacts.detail: “Permissions inspector Feature Branch” was a full-on feature drop: +2273/-568 across 42 files in cloudinary.

funFacts.label: Permission Blitz Finale
funFacts.detail: You closed the year with a permissions_blitz streak (Dec 17, Dec 29, Dec 31)—shipping infra + spec fixes right up to New Year’s Eve.

funFacts.label: Quarter Peak
funFacts.detail: Q2 was your busiest shipping season with 10 merged PRs—prime time for the Permissions Inspector build-out.

bigRocks.title: Permissions Inspector: The X-Ray Vision Upgrade
bigRocks.impact: Delivered a major Permissions Inspector capability across dozens of files, making permission behavior visible and actionable.

bigRocks.title: Enforcer Unification: One Rules Engine to Rule Them All
bigRocks.impact: Refactored and unified permission enforcers to cut repetition and standardize permission checks across scopes.

bigRocks.title: Granular Permissions Spec Compatibility Layer
bigRocks.impact: Built infrastructure so specs can run in both granular-permissions modes without rewriting controller tests.

bigRocks.title: RequestContext Everywhere
bigRocks.impact: Plumbed RequestContext through internal APIs and stabilized specs by resetting context after each run.

bigRocks.title: PDP Cleanup: Surgical Reverts & Action Tweaks
bigRocks.impact: Kept the PDP surface area safe and consistent with targeted action updates and a clean revert when needed.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Permissions groundwork + Addons fixes, capped by a big “enforcer & inspect” push that set the tone for the year.
The Permissions Inspector era—multiple large drops landed, turning permission logic into something you can actually reason about.
Stability and correctness: RequestContext plumbing, spec hygiene, and even an N+1 fix—quiet wins that prevent loud outages.
Year-end permissions_blitz: spec compatibility infra + granular spec fixes, merged right up to 2025-12-31.

topRepos.name: cloudinary
topRepos.funFact: Your main stage: 25 PRs including the year’s biggest feature drop (Permissions Inspector) and the deepest refactor (Enforcer Unification).

topRepos.name: permissions_pdp
topRepos.funFact: Small repo, high leverage: quick, targeted changes (and a clean revert) to keep permissions behavior predictable.

topRepos.name: cloudinary
topRepos.funFact: Also home to your Q4 sprint finish—granular-permissions spec compatibility shipped in time for the New Year’s Eve merge.

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Permissions Clarity
yearInReview.tagline: 27 PRs merged, 10,026 lines added, 356 reviews—shipping tools, refactors, and spec infrastructure that made permissions make sense.
